{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Odd Keystone |image = [[File:Odd_Keystone.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Odd Keystone''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 6 {{Diamonds}} }} ==Description== The '''Odd Keystone''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Odd Keystone has a value of 6 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Odd Keystone appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:OddKeystoneMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Odd Keystones can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Old Chateau|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Distortion World|Legendary}} |} |}
